headline.main: LOSS OF SOVIET SHIP REPORTED BY TOKYO; Torpedoing Off Japan Is Laid to Allied Submarine

lead_paragraph: TOKYO, May 2 (From Japanese broadcasts recorded by The Associated Press) -- The Tokyo radio declared today that the 4,761-ton Russian merchant ship Angristroi was torpedoed last night by a United States submarine or one of its allies and left in a sinking condition off the southwest coast of Kyushu, southernmost of the main Japanese islands.
abstract: Tokyo radio repts USSR SS Angarstroi torpedoed by Allied submarine off Kyushu; repts Jap SS Calcutta Maru sunk by submarine in Jap waters
